divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in my backyard cleaning my pool around 10:00-11:00pm at night, my pool lights were on. I just happened to look up and seen 4 large lights in a square formation coming towards my home moving slowly with no sound,low from the sky, I then ran into the house to alert my husband to come outside. when i turned around i noticed that the 4 large lights transformed into 1 red ball of light and was moving faster then before then my husband and I watched it go straight up into the sky super fast until it disappeared. What did i think the object was when i first noticed it, you ask? It was a UFO, Planes dont frighten me this did. no blinking lights of any kind just red very large still lights no sound.
Summary: Witnessed 4 large lights in a square formation, transformed into 1 large light and went straight up into the sky then disappeared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Clive
There were no other sightings in Clive on or around June 17th 2012
